TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ProgressBarRenderer extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides methods used to render a progress bar control with visual styles. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer>类提供了一套`static`可用于呈现具有的操作系统当前视觉样式的进度栏控件的方法。 呈现控件是指绘制控件的用户界面。 这是很有用，如果您正在绘制的自定义控件应具有的当前视觉样式外观。 若要绘制一个进度栏，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.DrawHorizontalBar%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.DrawVerticalBar%2A>方法来绘制空白的栏，然后使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.DrawHorizontalChunks%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.DrawVerticalChunks%2A>方法来绘制填充的栏中的元素。
如果视觉样式应用于 windows 的应用程序的工作区在操作系统中启用了可视样式，此类方法将绘制当前视觉样式的进度栏。 否则的方法和属性的此类将引发<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。 若要确定是否可以使用此类的成员，你可以检查的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A>属性。
此类将包装的功能<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer?displayProperty=nameWithType>设置为公开的元素之一<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ProgressBar.Bar?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ProgressBar.BarVertical?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ProgressBar.Chunk?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ProgressBar.ChunkVertical?displayProperty=nameWithType>类。 有关详细信息，请参阅[以视觉样式呈现控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建使用的自定义控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.DrawVerticalBar%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.DrawVerticalChunks%2A>方法绘制一个垂直进度栏。 该控件使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Timer>重绘每秒的进度栏时添加的代码段。 `SetupProgressBar`方法使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.ChunkThickness%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.ChunkSpaceThickness%2A>属性计算绘制每个逐渐变大矩形的高度。
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/VB/form1.vb#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static int ChunkSpaceThickness { get; }
.property int32 ChunkSpaceThickness
Public Shared ReadOnly Property ChunkSpaceThickness As Integer
public: static property int ChunkSpaceThickness { int get(); };
member this.ChunkSpaceThickness : int

Docs.summary: Gets the width, in pixels, of the space between each inner piece of the progress bar.
Docs.value: 以像素为单位，进度栏的每个内部格之间的间距的宽度。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此值确定的操作系统当前视觉样式。
在之前访问此属性，您应验证<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A>属性返回`true`。
## Examples 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.ChunkSpaceThickness%2A>属性来确定的每个矩形，表示绘制进度栏的增量大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.DrawVerticalChunks%2A>方法。 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer>类。
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/VB/form1.vb#4)]

Docs.exception: The operating system does not support visual styles. -or- Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system. -or- Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.

MemberSignature.Value: public static int ChunkThickness { get; }
.property int32 ChunkThickness
Public Shared ReadOnly Property ChunkThickness As Integer
public: static property int ChunkThickness { int get(); };
member this.ChunkThickness : int

Docs.summary: Gets the width, in pixels, of a single inner piece of the progress bar.
Docs.value: 以像素为单位，进度栏单个内部格的宽度。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此值确定的操作系统当前视觉样式。
在之前访问此属性，您应验证<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A>属性返回`true`。
## Examples 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.ChunkThickness%2A>属性来确定的每个矩形，表示绘制进度栏的增量大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.DrawVerticalChunks%2A>方法。 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer>类。
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/VB/form1.vb#4)]

Docs.exception: The operating system does not support visual styles. -or- Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system. -or- Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.

The that specifies the bounds to be filled by progress bar pieces.
Docs.summary: Draws a set of progress bar pieces that fill a horizontal progress bar.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此方法绘制的每个进度栏格跨越的高度`bounds`参数。 绘制进度栏格数由宽度`bounds`和返回值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.ChunkSpaceThickness%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.ChunkThickness%2A>属性。
使用此方法之前，应验证<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A>属性返回`true`。

Docs.exception: The operating system does not support visual styles. -or- Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system. -or- Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.

Docs.summary: Draws an empty progress bar control that fills in vertically.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用此方法之前，应验证<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A>属性返回`true`。
## Examples 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.DrawVerticalBar%2A>方法在自定义控件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A>方法，以便绘制空白进度栏。 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer>类。
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此方法绘制的每个进度栏格跨越的宽度`bounds`参数。 绘制进度栏格数由的高度`bounds`和返回值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.ChunkSpaceThickness%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.ChunkThickness%2A>。
使用此方法之前，应验证<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A>属性返回`true`。
## Examples 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.DrawVerticalChunks%2A>中的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Timer.Tick?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件处理程序以绘制进度栏的每个增量。 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer>类。
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/CS/form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/VB/form1.vb#6)]

Docs.exception: The operating system does not support visual styles. -or- Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system. -or- Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool IsSupported { get; }
.property bool IsSupported
Public Shared ReadOnly Property IsSupported As Boolean
public: static property bool IsSupported { bool get(); };
member this.IsSupported : bool

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the class can be used to draw a progress bar control with visual styles.
Docs.value: 如果用户已启用操作系统中的视觉样式和视觉样式应用于 windows 的应用程序; 的工作区否则为。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果此属性为`false`，将引发的方法和属性的此类<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。
## Examples 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A>属性来确定是否需要调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer.DrawVerticalBar%2A>方法。 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer>类。
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/VB/form1.vb#2)]
